doc.title: A Cheaper Way to Go
doc.plot: A Cheaper Way To go is a quirky short documentary about an unconventional business in Nashville, TN: The Casket Store. Surrounded by ordinary shops selling everything from manicures and haircuts to insurance and cold beer, The Casket Store instead offers its customers caskets, urns and other funeral merchandise at rock bottom prices. Go into the next world in style and on a budget!
